00021 StringEx Eojul::_charDelimiter  = "?!.-,\"'()[]<>~\\:;`_/|+=*&^%$#@{}";                 // 1바이트 기호

00024 Eojul::Eojul( unsigned int sizeBuffer ) : _buffer( 0 ),     _tags( 0 ),      _counts( 0 ),  _scores( 0 ), _orders( 0 ),
00025                                                                                   _sizeBuffer( 0 ), _posBuffer( 0 ), _posTags( 0 ), _posCounts( 1 ), _posScores( 1 ),
00026                                                                                   _posOrders( 0 ), _offset( -1 ), _isNBestMode( false ), _isOrdersExpanded( false )    // _posCounts(0) is a special area;
00027 {
00028         if( sizeBuffer < DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00029         {
00030                 _sizeBuffer = DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE;
00031                 Logger::SetMessage( "At the time of creating instance, buffer size is less than DEFAULT size, so it is set as DEFAULT size." ); 
00032         }
00033 
00034         _sizeBuffer = sizeBuffer;
00035 
00036         if( sizeBuffer > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00037         {
00038                 _buffer = new char          [ _sizeBuffer ];
00039                 _tags   = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) ];
00040                 _counts = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00041                 _scores = new double            [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00042         }
00043         else
00044         {
00045                 _buffer = innerBuffer;
00046                 _tags   = innerTags;
00047                 _counts = innerCounts;
00048                 _scores = innerScores;
00049         }
00050 
00051         _buffer[0] = 0;
00052     _tags[0]   = 0;
00053         _tags[1]   = 0;
00054         _counts[0] = 0;
00055         _scores[0] = 0; 
00056 }
00057 
00058 Eojul::Eojul( const Eojul& eojul ) : _buffer( 0 ),     _tags( 0 ),      _counts( 0 ),  _scores( 0 ), _orders( 0 ),
00059                                                                          _sizeBuffer( 0 ), _posBuffer( 0 ), _posTags( 0 ), _posCounts( 1 ), _posScores( 1 ),
00060                                                                          _posOrders( 0 ),  _offset( -1 ), _isNBestMode( false ), _isOrdersExpanded( false )    // _posCounts(0) is a special area;
00061 {
00062         _sizeBuffer = eojul.getBufferSize();
00063 
00064         if( eojul.getBufferSize() > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00065         {
00066                 //freeBuffer();
00067 
00068                 _buffer = new char          [ _sizeBuffer ];
00069                 _tags   = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) ];
00070                 _counts = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00071                 _scores = new double            [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00072         }
00073         else
00074         {
00075                 _buffer = innerBuffer;
00076                 _tags   = innerTags;
00077                 _counts = innerCounts;
00078                 _scores = innerScores;
00079         }
00080         
00081         _posBuffer = eojul.getBufferPos();
00082         _posTags   = eojul.getTagsPos();
00083         _posCounts = eojul.getCountsPos();
00084         _posScores = eojul.getScoresPos();
00085         _offset    = eojul.getOffset();
00086 
00087         memcpy( _buffer, eojul.getBufferPtr(), sizeof(char)                      * _posBuffer );
00088         memcpy( _tags,   eojul.getTagsPtr  (), sizeof(unsigned int)  * _posTags   );
00089         memcpy( _counts, eojul.getCountsPtr(), sizeof(unsigned int)  * _posCounts );
00090         memcpy( _scores, eojul.getScoresPtr(), sizeof(double)            * _posScores );
00091 
00092         //_buffer[_posBuffer] = 0;
00093         _tags  [_posTags  ] = 0;
00094         _counts[_posCounts] = 0;
00095         _scores[_posScores] = 0;        
00096 }

00098 Eojul::~Eojul( void )
00099 {
00100         if( _sizeBuffer > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE ) freeBuffer();
00101 }

00103 int Eojul::isDigit( StringEx& strex )
00104 {
00105         for(unsigned int i=0; i<strex.length(); i++)
00106         {
00107                 if( !(strex[i] >= '0' && strex[i] <= '9') ) return 0;
00108         }
00109 
00110         return 1;
00111 }
00112 
00113 int Eojul::isDigit( const char ch )
00114 {
00115         if( !(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') ) return 0;
00116 
00117         return 1;
00118 }

00120 void Eojul::setString( const char* pString )
00121 {
00122         int  i = 0;
00123         int  lenStr = (int)strlen( pString );
00124         int  infoEojul = 0;
00125 
00126         if( lenStr >= DEFAULT_LINE_BUFF_SIZE )
00127         {
00128                 Logger::SetMessage( pString );
00129                 Logger::SetMessage( "A single line is bigger than DEFAULT buffer size." );
00130                 return ;
00131         }
00132 
00133         if( lenStr > DEFAULT_WORD_SIZE )
00134         {
00135                 setEojulAndInfo( pString, EI_TOOLONG );
00136         }
00137 
00138         char buffer[DEFAULT_LINE_BUFF_SIZE];
00139 //      memset( buffer, 0x0, DEFAULT_LINE_BUFF_SIZE );
00140         memcpy( buffer, pString, lenStr+1 );
00141 
00142         WK_Hanja::convertToHangul( buffer, buffer );
00143 
00144         for( i = 0; i <= lenStr; i++ )
00145         {               
00146                 if( (unsigned char)buffer[i] >= (unsigned char)0x80 &&
00147                         (!(((unsigned char)buffer[i] >= (unsigned char)0xA1) &&
00148                         ((unsigned char)buffer[i] <= (unsigned char)0xAC)) ||
00149                         (((unsigned char)buffer[i] == (unsigned char)0xA4) &&
00150                         (i+1 < lenStr) && (unsigned char)buffer[i+1] < (unsigned char)0xFD)) )
00151                 {
00152                         if( i+1 < lenStr )
00153                         {
00154                                  i++;
00155                                  infoEojul        |= EI_HANGUL;
00156                         }
00157                         else infoEojul        |= EI_ILLEGAL;
00158                 }
00159                 else if(((unsigned char)buffer[i] >= '0'/*0x30*/ && (unsigned char)buffer[i] <= '9'/*0x39*/))
00160                 {
00161                         infoEojul        |= EI_DIGIT;
00162                 }
00163                 else if(((unsigned char)buffer[i] >= 'A'/*0x41*/ && (unsigned char)buffer[i] <= 'Z'/*0x5A*/) 
00164                         || ((unsigned char)buffer[i] >= 'a'/*0x61*/ && (unsigned char)buffer[i] <= 'z'/*0x7A*/))
00165                 {
00166                         infoEojul        |= EI_ALPHABET;
00167                 }
00168                 else if( _charDelimiter.getIndex(buffer[i]) >= 0 )
00169                 {
00170                         infoEojul        |= TEI_INCLUDESC;
00171                 }               
00172                 else if( (unsigned char)buffer[i] >= (unsigned char)0x80 )
00173                 {                       
00174                         if( i+1 < lenStr && (unsigned char)buffer[i+1] > 0x80 )
00175                         {
00176                                 char szT[3];
00177                                 szT[0] = buffer[i];
00178                                 szT[1] = buffer[i+1];
00179                                 szT[2] = '\0';
00180                                 
00181                                 if( _wcharDelimiter.getIndex(szT) >= 0 )
00182                                 {
00183                                         infoEojul |= TEI_INCLUDESC;
00184                                 }
00185                         }
00186                         i++;
00187                 }
00188                 else if( buffer[i]==' ' || buffer[i]=='\t' || buffer[i]=='\n' || buffer[i]=='\0' )
00189                 {
00190                         if( i != 0 )
00191                         {
00192                                 buffer[i] = '\0';
00193                                 setEojulAndInfo( buffer, infoEojul );
00194                                 infoEojul = 0;
00195                                 break;
00196                         }
00197                 }
00198                 else
00199                 {                       
00200                 }
00201         }
00202 }
00203 
00204 int Eojul::makeNBest( unsigned char nBest )
00205 {
00206         if( nBest > 0 )
00207         {
00208                 _isNBestMode = true;
00209         }
00210         else 
00211         {
00212                 _isNBestMode = false;
00213                 return _counts[0];
00214         }
00215 
00216         if( _counts[0] < nBest ) 
00217         {
00218                 nBest = _counts[0];
00219         }
00220 
00221         unsigned int i, j;
00222 
00223         if( nBest > (int)(DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) * 2 )
00224         {
00225                 _orders = new unsigned int [nBest];
00226                 _isOrdersExpanded = true;
00227         }
00228         else
00229         {
00230                 _orders = innerOrders;
00231         }
00232 
00233         _orders[0] = nBest;
00234 
00235         if( nBest == 1 )
00236         {
00237                 _orders[1] = getOneBestIndex()+1;
00238                 _isNBestMode = true;
00239                 return nBest;
00240         }
00241 
00242         for( i = 1; i <= _counts[0]; i++ ) _orders[i] = i;
00243 
00244         for( i = 1; i <= nBest; i++ )
00245         {
00246                 double sti = _scores[ _orders[i] ];
00247 
00248                 if( sti >= 100.0 )
00249                 {
00250                         sti = _scores[ (int)(sti-100.0)+1 ];
00251                 }
00252                 
00253                 for( j = i + 1; j <= _counts[0]; j++ )
00254                 {
00255                         double stj = _scores[ _orders[j] ];
00256 
00257                         if( stj >= 100.0 )
00258                         {
00259                                 stj = _scores[ (int)(stj-100.0)+1 ];
00260                         }
00261 
00262                         if( sti < stj )
00263                         {
00264                                 int temp   = _orders[i];
00265                                 _orders[i] = _orders[j];
00266                                 _orders[j] = temp;
00267                         }
00268                 }
00269         }
00270 
00271         return nBest;
00272 }
00273 
00274 char* Eojul::getLexicon( int nPos, int nIdx )
00275 {
00276         if( (nPos < 0) || (nIdx < 0) )  return 0;
00277         if( nPos > (int)_counts[0]-1 )  return 0;
00278 
00279         if( _isNBestMode ) nPos = _orders[ nPos + 1 ] - 1;
00280         if( (unsigned int)nIdx > _counts[(nPos*2) + 1] )        return 0;
00281 
00282         int gap = _counts[ (nPos*2) + 2 ];
00283 
00284         return ( &_buffer[ _tags[ (gap*2) + (nIdx*2) + 3 ] ] );
00285 }
00286 
00287 int Eojul::getPOS( int nPos, int nIdx )
00288 {
00289         if( (nPos < 0) || (nIdx < 0) )  return -1;
00290         if( nPos > (int)_counts[0]-1 )  return -1;
00291 
00292         if( _isNBestMode ) nPos = _orders[ nPos + 1 ] - 1;
00293         if( (unsigned int)nIdx > _counts[(nPos*2) + 1] )        return -1;
00294 
00295         int gap = _counts[ (nPos*2) + 2 ];
00296 
00297         return ( _tags[ (gap*2) + (nIdx*2) + 2 ] );
00298 }
00299 
00300 char* Eojul::getStrPOS( int nPos, int nIdx )
00301 {
00302 //      if( _isNBestMode ) nPos = _orders[ nPos + 1 ] - 1;
00303 
00304         return TagSet::convertCodeToTagString( getPOS(nPos, nIdx) );
00305 }

00307 bool Eojul::isIndexWord( int nPos, int nIdx )
00308 {
00309 //      if( _isNBestMode ) nPos = _orders[ nPos + 1 ] - 1;
00310 
00311         unsigned int POS = (unsigned int)getPOS( nPos, nIdx );
00312         if( (POS & mIndexTagSet) == POS )
00313         {
00314                 if( (mIndexLength > 0) && ((POS & SN) || (POS & FL)) )
00315                 {
00316                         if( (unsigned int)(strlen( getLexicon( nPos, nIdx ) )) >= mIndexLength )
00317                         {
00318                                 return true;
00319                         }
00320                         else
00321                         {
00322                                 return false;
00323                         }
00324                 }
00325                 
00326                 return true;
00327         }
00328         else                                                            return false;
00329 }
00330 
00331 double Eojul::getScore( int nPos )
00332 {
00333         if( _isNBestMode ) nPos = _orders[ nPos + 1 ] - 1;
00334 
00335         double ret = _scores[nPos+1];
00336 
00337         if( ret >= 100.0 )
00338         {
00339                 ret = _scores[ (int)(ret-100.0)+1 ];
00340         }
00341 
00342         return ret;
00343 }
00344 
00345 int Eojul::getOneBestIndex()
00346 {
00347         int totalcnt = _counts[0];
00348         int maxIndex = 1;
00349 
00350         if( _scores[maxIndex] >= 100.0 )
00351         {
00352                 maxIndex = (int)(_scores[maxIndex] - 100.0);
00353                 maxIndex++;
00354         }
00355 
00356         int i, t;
00357 
00358         for( i = 2; i <= totalcnt; i++ )
00359         {
00360                 if( _scores[i] >= 100.0 )
00361                 {
00362                         t = (int)(_scores[i] - 100.0);
00363                         t++;
00364                         if( _scores[maxIndex] < _scores[t] )    maxIndex = t;
00365                 }
00366                 else
00367                 {
00368                         if( _scores[maxIndex] < _scores[i] )    maxIndex = i;
00369                 }
00370         }
00371 
00372         _isNBestMode = false;
00373 
00374         return maxIndex-1;
00375 }
00376 
00377 int Eojul::getLinkedIndex( int nPos )
00378 {
00379         double ret = _scores[nPos+1];
00380 
00381         if( ret >= 100.0 )
00382         {
00383                 ret -= 100.0;
00384         }
00385         else    ret = -1;
00386 
00387         return (int)ret;
00388 }
00389 
00390 void Eojul::initialize( bool willBeToTheDefaultState )
00391 {
00392         _posBuffer = 0;
00393         _posTags   = 0;
00394         _posCounts = 1;
00395         _posScores = 1;
00396         _offset    = -1;
00397 
00398         if( willBeToTheDefaultState )
00399         {
00400                 if( _sizeBuffer > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00401                 {
00402                         freeBuffer();
00403 
00404                         _sizeBuffer = DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE;
00405 
00406                         _buffer = innerBuffer;
00407                         _tags   = innerTags;
00408                         _counts = innerCounts;
00409                         _scores = innerScores;
00410                 }
00411         }
00412 
00413         _buffer[0] = 0;
00414     _tags[0]   = 0;
00415         _tags[1]   = 0;
00416         _counts[0] = 0;
00417         _counts[1] = 0;
00418         _counts[2] = 0;
00419         _scores[0] = 0;
00420 
00421         _isNBestMode      = false;
00422         _isOrdersExpanded = false;
00423 }
00424 
00425 void Eojul::freeBuffer()
00426 {
00427         if ( _buffer != 0 )     delete [] _buffer;
00428         if ( _tags   != 0 )     delete [] _tags;
00429         if ( _counts != 0 )     delete [] _counts;
00430         if ( _scores != 0 )     delete [] _scores;
00431         if ( _isOrdersExpanded )        
00432         {
00433                 delete [] _orders;
00434                 _orders = innerOrders;
00435         }
00436 }
00437 
00438 int Eojul::setEojulAndInfo( const char* word, unsigned int info )
00439 {
00440         initialize();
00441 
00442         unsigned int length = (unsigned int)strlen( word );
00443 
00444         while ( _posBuffer + length + 1 >= _sizeBuffer )
00445         {
00446                 doubleBuffer();
00447         }
00448         strcpy( &_buffer[ _posBuffer ], word );
00449 
00450         while ( (_posTags + 2) >= _sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS )
00451         {
00452                 doubleBuffer();
00453         }
00454         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = info;
00455         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = _posBuffer;
00456 
00457         _posBuffer += length + 2;
00458 
00459         return 1;
00460 }
00461 
00462 int Eojul::setMorphAndTag( unsigned int tag )
00463 {
00464         while( (_posTags + 2) >= _sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS )
00465         {
00466                 doubleBuffer();
00467         }
00468         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = tag;
00469         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = 0;
00470 
00471         // 혹시 필요하면 _counts도 doubleBuffer() 해야 할 수도 있다.
00472         _counts[ _posCounts ]++;
00473 
00474         return 1;
00475 }
00476 
00477 int Eojul::setMorphAndTag( const char* word, unsigned int tag )
00478 {
00479         unsigned int length = (unsigned int)strlen( word );
00480 
00481         while( _posBuffer + length + 1 >= _sizeBuffer )
00482         {
00483                 doubleBuffer();
00484         }
00485         strcpy( &_buffer[ _posBuffer ], word );
00486 
00487         while( (_posTags + 2) >= _sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS )
00488         {
00489                 doubleBuffer();
00490         }
00491         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = tag;
00492         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = _posBuffer;
00493 
00494         _posBuffer += length + 2;
00495         // 혹시 필요하면 _counts도 doubleBuffer() 해야 할 수도 있다.
00496         _counts[ _posCounts ]++;
00497 
00498         return 1;
00499 }
00500 
00501 int Eojul::setMorphAndTag( const char* str, char* word, unsigned int tag )
00502 {
00503         unsigned int lenword = (unsigned int)strlen( word );
00504         unsigned int lenstr  = (unsigned int)strlen( str );
00505 
00506         while ( _posBuffer + lenword + lenstr + 1 >= _sizeBuffer )
00507         {
00508                 doubleBuffer();
00509         }
00510         strcpy( &_buffer[ _posBuffer ], str );
00511         strcpy( &_buffer[ _posBuffer + lenstr ], word );
00512 
00513         while ( (_posTags + 2) >= _sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS )
00514         {
00515                 doubleBuffer();
00516         }
00517         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = tag;
00518         _tags[ _posTags++ ] = _posBuffer;
00519 
00520         _posBuffer += lenstr + lenword + 2;
00521         // 혹시 필요하면 _counts도 doubleBuffer() 해야 할 수도 있다.
00522         _counts[ _posCounts ]++;
00523 
00524         return 1;
00525 }
00526 
00527 void Eojul::increaseAnalysisResults()
00528 {
00529         _counts[ 0 ]++;
00530 
00531         if( _posCounts == 1 )
00532         {
00533                 _counts[ _posCounts+1 ] = 0;
00534         }
00535         else
00536         {
00537                 _counts[ _posCounts + 1] = _counts[ _posCounts - 1 ] + _counts[ _posCounts - 2 ];
00538         }
00539 
00540         _counts[ _posCounts ] = 0;
00541         _scores[ _posScores ] = 0;
00542 }
00543 
00544 void Eojul::setScore( double score )
00545 {
00546         _scores[ _posScores ] = score;
00547 }
00548 
00549 void Eojul::setScore( int nPos, double score )
00550 {
00551         _scores[ nPos+1 ] = score;
00552 }
00553 
00554 void Eojul::close()
00555 {
00556         if( _counts[ _posCounts ] != 0 )
00557         {
00558                 _posCounts += 2;
00559                 _posScores++;
00560                 _counts[ _posCounts ] = 0;
00561                 _scores[ _posScores ] = 0;
00562         }       
00563 }
00564 
00565 int Eojul::doubleBuffer()
00566 {
00567         unsigned int sizePreviousBuffer = _sizeBuffer;
00568 
00569         _sizeBuffer *= TWICE;
00570 
00571         char*                   buffer = new char          [ _sizeBuffer ];
00572         unsigned int*   tags   = new unsigned int  [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) ];
00573         unsigned int*   counts = new unsigned int  [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00574         double*                 scores = new double                [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00575 
00576 //      memset( buffer, 0, sizeof(char)          * _sizeBuffer );
00577 //      memset( tags,   0, sizeof(unsigned int)  * (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) );
00578 //      memset( counts, 0, sizeof(unsigned int) * (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00579 //      memset( scores, 0, sizeof(double)                * (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00580 
00581         memcpy( buffer, _buffer, sizeof(char)              * sizePreviousBuffer );
00582         memcpy( tags,   _tags,   sizeof(unsigned int)  * (int)(sizePreviousBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) );
00583 //      /memcpy( counts, _counts, sizeof(unsigned int) * (int)(sizePreviousBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00584 //      memcpy( scores, _scores, sizeof(double)            * (int)(sizePreviousBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00585 
00586         //memcpy( buffer, _buffer, sizeof(char)            * _posBuffer );
00587         //memcpy( tags,   _tags,   sizeof(unsigned int)  * _posTags   );
00588         //memcpy( counts, _counts, sizeof(unsigned int) * _posCounts+1 );
00589         //memcpy( scores, _scores, sizeof(double)                  * _posScores+1 );
00590         memcpy( counts, _counts, sizeof(unsigned int) * (int)(sizePreviousBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00591         memcpy( scores, _scores, sizeof(double)            * (int)(sizePreviousBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) );
00592 
00593         if( sizePreviousBuffer > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00594         {
00595                 freeBuffer();
00596         }
00597 
00598         _buffer = buffer;
00599         _tags   = tags;
00600         _counts = counts;
00601         _scores = scores;
00602 
00603         return 1;
00604 }
00605 
00606 void Eojul::showInfomation( ostream& outStream, bool isPreAnalysis )
00607 {
00608         unsigned int posTags   = 0;
00609         unsigned int posCounts = 0;
00610         unsigned int posScores = 0;
00611 
00612     if( !isPreAnalysis )
00613     {
00614             outStream << "[" << _buffer << "]" << endl;
00615     }
00616     else
00617     {
00618         outStream << _buffer << "\t";
00619     }
00620 
00621 //      outStream << "Offset : " << getOffset() << endl;
00622 
00623         unsigned int countAnalysis = _counts[ posCounts ];
00624         posTags += 2;
00625         posCounts++;
00626         posScores++;
00627 
00628         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < countAnalysis; i++ )
00629         {
00630                 unsigned int countMorph = _counts[ posCounts ];
00631                 posCounts += 2;
00632 
00633                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00634                 {
00635                         if ( j != 0 )
00636                         {
00637                                 if( isPreAnalysis ) outStream << "+";
00638                                 else outStream << " + ";
00639                         }
00640                         else if( !isPreAnalysis ) outStream << "\t" << i << ": ";
00641 
00642                         unsigned int tag = _tags[ posTags++ ];
00643                         unsigned int pos = _tags[ posTags++ ];
00644 
00645                         outStream << &_buffer[ pos ] << "/" << TagSet::convertCodeToTagString( tag );
00646                 }
00647 
00648                 if( !isPreAnalysis )
00649                 {
00650                         outStream << "\t" << getScore( i );//_scores[ posScores++ ];
00651                         if( getLinkedIndex( i ) > -1 )  outStream << "\t" << getLinkedIndex( i );
00652                         outStream << endl;
00653                 }
00654                 else
00655                 {
00656                         if( i != countAnalysis-1 ) outStream << "@";
00657                         else outStream << endl;
00658                 }
00659         }
00660 }
00661 
00662 const Eojul& Eojul::operator = ( const Eojul& eojul )
00663 {
00664         if( _sizeBuffer < eojul.getBufferSize() )
00665         {
00666                 if( _sizeBuffer > DEFAULT_EOJUL_BUFFER_SIZE )
00667                 {
00668                         freeBuffer();
00669                 }
00670 
00671                 _sizeBuffer = eojul.getBufferSize();
00672 
00673                 _buffer = new char          [ _sizeBuffer ];
00674                 _tags   = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_TAGS) ];
00675                 _counts = new unsigned int      [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00676                 _scores = new double            [ (int)(_sizeBuffer/RATIO_BUFFER_AND_COUNTS) ];
00677         }
00678 
00679         _posBuffer = eojul.getBufferPos();
00680         _posTags   = eojul.getTagsPos();
00681         _posCounts = eojul.getCountsPos();
00682         _posScores = eojul.getScoresPos();
00683         _offset    = eojul.getOffset();
00684 
00685         memcpy( _buffer, eojul.getBufferPtr(), sizeof(char)                      * _posBuffer );
00686         memcpy( _tags,   eojul.getTagsPtr  (), sizeof(unsigned int)  * _posTags   );
00687         memcpy( _counts, eojul.getCountsPtr(), sizeof(unsigned int) * _posCounts );
00688         memcpy( _scores, eojul.getScoresPtr(), sizeof(double)            * _posScores );
00689 
00690         _buffer[_posBuffer] = 0;
00691         _tags  [_posTags  ] = 0;
00692         _counts[_posCounts] = 0;
00693         _scores[_posScores] = 0;
00694 
00695         _isNBestMode      = getNBestState();
00696         _isOrdersExpanded = getOrdersState();
00697 
00698         return *this;
00699 }
00700 
00701 void Eojul::append( const Eojul& peojul )
00702 {
00703         unsigned int posTags   = 0;
00704         unsigned int posCounts = 1;
00705         unsigned int posScores = 1;
00706         unsigned int appendCount = peojul._counts[ posTags ];
00707 
00708         posTags += 2;
00709 
00710         for( unsigned int i=0; i < appendCount; i++ )
00711         {
00712                 unsigned int countMorph = peojul._counts[ posCounts ];
00713                 posCounts += 2;
00714 
00715                 for ( unsigned int j=0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00716                 {
00717                         unsigned int tag = peojul._tags[ posTags++ ];
00718                         unsigned int pos = peojul._tags[ posTags++ ];
00719 
00720                         this->setMorphAndTag( &peojul._buffer[ pos ], tag );
00721                 }
00722 
00723                 if( peojul._scores[ posScores ] > 0.0 )
00724                 {
00725                         this->setScore( this->_scores[ _posScores ] + peojul._scores[ posScores++ ] );
00726                 }
00727         }
00728 }
00729 
00730 void Eojul::merge( const Eojul& eojul1, const Eojul& eojul2 )
00731 {
00732         unsigned int posTags1 = 0, posTags2 = 0;
00733         unsigned int posCounts1 = 1, posCounts2 = 0, posScores1 = 1, posScores2 = 1;
00734         unsigned int mergeCount = eojul1._counts[ posTags1 ];
00735 
00736         posTags1 += 2;
00737 
00738     unsigned int i, j, countMorph;
00739 
00740     for( i=0; i < mergeCount; i++ )
00741         {
00742                 this->increaseAnalysisResults();
00743                 
00744                 countMorph = eojul1._counts[ posCounts1 ];
00745                 posCounts1 += 2;
00746 
00747                 for ( j=0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00748                 {
00749                         unsigned int tag = eojul1._tags[ posTags1++ ];
00750                         unsigned int pos = eojul1._tags[ posTags1++ ];
00751                         
00752                         this->setMorphAndTag( &eojul1._buffer[ pos ], tag );
00753                 }
00754 
00755                 if( eojul2._counts[0] > 0 )
00756                 {
00757                         posTags2 = 2, posCounts2 = 1;
00758 
00759                         countMorph = eojul2._counts[ posCounts2 ];
00760 
00761                         for ( j=0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00762                         {
00763                                 unsigned int tag = eojul2._tags[ posTags2++ ];
00764                                 unsigned int pos = eojul2._tags[ posTags2++ ];
00765 
00766                                 this->setMorphAndTag( &eojul2._buffer[ pos ], tag );
00767                         }
00768                 }
00769                 else
00770                 {
00771                         this->setMorphAndTag( eojul2.getBufferPtr(), NNR );
00772                 }
00773 
00774                 this->setScore( eojul1._scores[ posScores1++ ] + eojul2._scores[ posScores2 ] );
00775                 this->close();
00776         }
00777 }
00778 
00779 void Eojul::backmerge( const Eojul& eojul1, const Eojul& eojul2 )
00780 {
00781         unsigned int posTags1 = 0, posTags2 = 0;
00782         unsigned int posCounts1 = 0, posCounts2 = 1, posScores1 = 1, posScores2 = 1;
00783         unsigned int mergeCount = eojul2._counts[ posTags2 ];
00784 
00785         posTags2 = 2;
00786 
00787     unsigned int i, j, countMorph;
00788 
00789         for( i = 0; i < mergeCount; i++ )
00790         {
00791                 this->increaseAnalysisResults();
00792                 
00793                 if( eojul1._counts[0] > 0 )
00794                 {
00795                         posTags1 = 2, posCounts1 = 1;
00796                         countMorph = eojul1._counts[ posCounts1 ];
00797 
00798                         for ( j=0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00799                         {
00800                                 unsigned int tag = eojul1._tags[ posTags1++ ];
00801                                 unsigned int pos = eojul1._tags[ posTags1++ ];
00802 
00803                                 this->setMorphAndTag( &eojul1._buffer[ pos ], tag );
00804                         }
00805                 }
00806                 else
00807                 {
00808                         this->setMorphAndTag( eojul1.getBufferPtr(), NNR );
00809                 }
00810 
00811                 countMorph = eojul2._counts[ posCounts2 ];
00812                 posCounts2 += 2;
00813                 for ( j = 0; j < countMorph; j++ )
00814                 {
00815                         unsigned int tag = eojul2._tags[ posTags2++ ];
00816                         unsigned int pos = eojul2._tags[ posTags2++ ];
00817 
00818                         this->setMorphAndTag( &eojul2._buffer[ pos ], tag );
00819                 }
00820 
00821                 this->setScore( eojul1._scores[ posScores1 ] + eojul2._scores[ posScores2++ ] );
00822                 this->close();
00823         }
00824 }
00825 
00826 char* Eojul::getBufferByIndex( int index )
00827 {
00828         if( index == 0 )                                        return _buffer;
00829         if( index > (int)(_posTags / 2) )       return 0;
00830 
00831         return &_buffer[ _tags[ (index * 2) + 1 ] ];
00832 }
